mapper.delete: /* deletetmpList 임시테이블 데이터 비우기*/ DELETE FROM T_SALE_ONLINE_ORD_TMP
mapper.select:
/* getOnlineSalesB2CInfo B2C엑셀 업로드*/ SELECT T1.SEQ ,T3.BCD_CD ,T3.BCD_NM ,T3.GOODS_NO ,T2.CUSTMR_CD ,T1.CUSTMR_NM ,T1.UNIQUE_INDEX FROM (select A.POS AS SEQ ,CASE WHEN A.VAL1 = '' THEN NULL ELSE A.VAL1 END AS CUSTMR_NM
,CASE WHEN LEN(B.VAL1) = 10 THEN B.VAL1 END AS GOODS_NO
,CASE WHEN LEN(B.VAL1) != 10 THEN B.VAL1 END AS BCD_CD
,C.VAL1 AS UNIQUE_INDEX from [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{CUSTMR_NM_LIST_STRING}, ',') A INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{GOODS_NO_LIST_STRING}, ',') B ON A.POS = B.POS INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{UNIQUE_INDEX_LIST_STRING}, ',') C ON A.POS = C.POS) T1 INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_CUSTMR T2 ON T1.CUSTMR_NM = T2.CUSTMR_NM INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_BCD T3 ON T1.GOODS_NO = T3.GOODS_NO OR T1.BCD_CD = T3.BCD_CD

/* getOnlineSalesB2BInfo B2B엑셀 업로드*/ SELECT T1.SEQ ,T3.BCD_NM ,T3.GOODS_NO ,T1.BCD_CD ,T2.CUSTMR_CD ,T1.CUSTMR_NM ,T1.UNIQUE_INDEX FROM (select A.POS AS SEQ ,A.VAL1 AS CUSTMR_NM ,B.VAL1 AS BCD_CD ,C.VAL1 AS UNIQUE_INDEX from [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{CUSTMR_NM_LIST_STRING}, ',') A INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{BCD_CD_LIST_STRING}, ',') B ON A.POS = B.POS INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{UNIQUE_INDEX_LIST_STRING}, ',') C ON A.POS = C.POS) T1 INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_CUSTMR T2 ON T1.CUSTMR_NM = T2.CUSTMR_NM INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_BCD T3 ON T1.BCD_CD = T3.BCD_CD

/* 판매내역 조회 getOSHistoryList */ SELECT T1.ORD_CD ,T1.ORD_NO ,(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120)) AS SALE_DATE ,(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.RESV_DATE),120)) AS RESV_DATE ,(T1.ORD_CD+'_'+T1.ORD_NO+'_'+T1.SALE_DATE+'_'+T1.RESV_DATE) AS UNIQUE_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: 모두') AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: ' + T3.BCD_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: ' + T2.CUSTMR_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: ' + (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120))) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: ' + (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120)) + ' / ' + T3.BCD_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: ' + (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120)) + ' / ' + T2.CUSTMR_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: '+ (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120))) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: '+ (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120)) + ' / ' + T3.BCD_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,(' 그룹 조건: '+ (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7),CONVERT(DATETIME,T1.SALE_DATE),120)) + ' / ' + T2.CUSTMR_NM) AS GRUP_INDEX
,T1.OUT_WARE_CD ,T1.ORDER_TYPE ,T1.CUSTMR_CD ,T2.CUSTMR_NM ,T1.BCD_CD ,T3.BCD_NM ,T1.ORD_QTY ,T1.SALE_PRICE ,T1.SALE_VAT ,T1.SALE_TOT_PRICE ,T1.DELI_YN ,T1.WMS_STATE ,T1.PUR_CONF_STATE FROM T_SALE_ONLINE_ORD T1
INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_CUSTMR T2 ON T1.CUSTMR_CD = T2.CUSTMR_CD INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_BCD T3 ON T1.BCD_CD = T3.BCD_CD
WHERE 1=1 AND T1.WMS_STATE = '06'
AND CONVERT(NVARCHAR(7),CONVERT(DATE,SALE_DATE),120) BETWEEN #{MONTH_FR} AND #{MONTH_TO}
AND CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATE,SALE_DATE),120) BETWEEN #{DATE_FR} AND #{DATE_TO}
ORDER BY T1.SALE_DATE

/* getPurFixInfo 판매내역 엑셀 업로드*/ SELECT T1.SEQ ,T1.UNIQUE_INDEX ,T1.ORD_CD ,T1.ORD_NO ,T1.SALE_DATE ,T1.RESV_DATE ,T2.OUT_WARE_CD ,T4.CUSTMR_NM ,T2.BCD_CD ,T3.BCD_NM ,T2.ORD_QTY ,T2.SALE_PRICE ,T2.SALE_VAT ,T2.SALE_TOT_PRICE ,T2.DELI_YN ,T2.WMS_STATE FROM (SELECT A.POS AS SEQ ,A.VAL1 AS ORD_CD ,B.VAL1 AS ORD_NO ,(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,C.VAL1),120)) AS SALE_DATE ,(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATETIME,D.VAL1),120)) AS RESV_DATE ,E.VAL1 AS UNIQUE_INDEX FROM [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{ORD_CD_LIST_STRING}, ',') A INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{ORD_NO_LIST_STRING}, ',') B ON A.POS = B.POS INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{SALE_DATE_LIST_STRING}, ',') C ON A.POS = C.POS INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{RESV_DATE_LIST_STRING}, ',') D ON A.POS = D.POS INNER JOIN [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{UNIQUE_INDEX_LIST_STRING}, ',') E ON A.POS = E.POS) T1 INNER JOIN T_SALE_ONLINE_ORD T2 ON T1.ORD_CD = T2.ORD_CD AND T1.ORD_NO = T2.ORD_NO INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_BCD T3 ON T2.BCD_CD = T3.BCD_CD INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_CUSTMR T4 ON T2.CUSTMR_CD = T4.CUSTMR_CD

/* getOnlineFixDetailList 판매확정 디테일 조회*/ SELECT T1.ORD_CD ,T1.BCD_CD ,T2.BCD_NM ,IFNULL(T1.PUR_AMT,'0') AS PUR_AMT ,IFNULL(T1.SALE_AMT,'0') AS SALE_AMT ,IFNULL(T1.SALE_VAT_AMT,'0') AS SALE_VAT_AMT ,IFNULL(T1.SALE_TOT_AMT,'0') AS SALE_TOT_AMT ,T3.CUSTMR_CD ,IFNULL(T1.SALE_QTY,'0') AS SALE_QTY ,CASE WHEN #{CUSTMR_CD} = 'DS00002020' THEN T1.CONF_AMT ELSE T3.SALE_TOT_AMT END AS CONF_AMT
FROM T_SALE_ONLINE_MAST_DETL T1 INNER JOIN T_STD_MAST_BCD T2 ON T1.BCD_CD = T2.BCD_CD INNER JOIN T_SALE_ONLINE_MAST T3 ON T1.ORD_CD = T3.ORD_CD AND T1.ORGN_DIV_CD = T3.ORGN_DIV_CD AND T1.ORGN_CD = T3.ORGN_CD WHERE T1.ORD_CD = #{ORD_CD} AND T3.CUSTMR_CD = #{CUSTMR_CD}

/* saveOnlineFixList 판매내역 - 구매상태 업데이트*/ DECLARE @TMP_PUR TABLE ( SEQ INT ,CONF_TYPE NVARCHAR(10) ,ORD_CD NVARCHAR(10) ) INSERT INTO @TMP_PUR ( SEQ, CONF_TYPE, ORD_CD )
SELECT T1.POS AS SEQ , T1.VAL1 AS CONF_TYPE , T2.VAL1 AS ORD_CD FROM (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{CONF_TYPE_LIST}, ',') ) T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM [dbo].[FN_SPLIT](#{ORD_CD_LIST}, ',') ) T2 ON T1.POS = T2.POS
UPDATE T_SALE_ONLINE_MAST SET CONF_TYPE = CASE WHEN TP.CONF_TYPE = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN TP.CONF_TYPE = 'Y' THEN 'N' END
, MPROGRM = #{MPROGRM} , MUSER = #{MUSER} , MDATE = NOW() FROM @TMP_PUR TP WHERE T_SALE_ONLINE_MAST.ORD_CD = TP.ORD_CD
